metadata.title: CVE-2021-30897 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue existed in the specification for the resource timing API. Thespecification was updated and the updated specification was implemented.This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.0.1. A malicious website mayexfiltrate data cross-origin.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
